abstract: The police's efforts to evict the Oakland encampment, which included using tear gas and firing projectiles, cast a chill in New York, though the protesters said they thought the spotlight was too bright for the police to use those kinds of tactics.
snippet: The police's efforts to evict the Oakland encampment, which included using tear gas and firing projectiles, cast a chill in New York, though the protesters said they thought the spotlight was too bright for the police to use those kinds of tactics.

headline.main: Crackdown on Oakland's Protesters Is Felt in Zuccotti Park
